name: Belton Logo
desc: Designed to reflect the city of Belton, this monogram is styled after Victorian letter design.

name: UI Icons
desc: Pixel art icons of various computer hardware components.

name: Spray Can Emblem
desc: A simple emblem designed as part of an icon series. The abstracted design uses simple shapes but still implies the image of a spray can.

name: Wave Design Logo
desc: A personal logo used for my retro computer graphics brand. The design utilizes modified letters from the Chicago typeface.

name: Crunix Logo
desc: A basic Helvetica logo used on official Crunix student organization documents. The bottom stripes represent the computer RGB color scheme.
